Quote.Author: Cynthia Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: I love spicy food

Quote.Author: Cynthia Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: Motherhood is the only thing in my life that I've really known for sure is something I wanted to do

Quote.Author: Cynthia Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: I love a warm bath at the end of a day

Quote.Author: Cynthia Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: I am heat obsessed. I crave the heat in my bedroom

Quote.Author: Cynthia Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't define myself. I'm just a woman in love with another woman

Quote.Author: Cynthia Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: I always sort of thought, 'I'm probably going to get breast cancer. There's a really good chance.'

Quote.Author: Cynthia Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: A couple of hanging glands have nothing to do with making someone a man

Quote.Author: Cynthia Nixon
Quote.QuoteValue: What I do for exercise sort of depends on what's happening in the rest of my life

Quote.Author: Cynthia Ozick
Quote.QuoteValue: Traveling is seeing; it is the implicit that we travel by

Quote.Author: Cynthia Ozick
Quote.QuoteValue: In saying what is obvious, never choose cunning. Yelling works better

Quote.Author: Cynthia Ozick
Quote.QuoteValue: The engineering is secondary to the vision

Quote.Author: Cynthia Ozick
Quote.QuoteValue: The novelist's intuition for the sacred differs from the translator's interrogation of the sacred

Quote.Author: Cynthia Ozick
Quote.QuoteValue: After a certain number of years, our faces become our biographies

Quote.Author: Cynthia Ozick
Quote.QuoteValue: I read in order to write. I read out of obsession with writing

Quote.Author: Cynthia Ozick
Quote.QuoteValue: All writing is presumption, of course, since no one knows what it is like to be another human being

Quote.Author: Cynthia Ozick
Quote.QuoteValue: I think most of my life I have not felt recognized

Quote.Author: Cynthia Ozick
Quote.QuoteValue: With certain rapturous exceptions, literature is the moral life

Quote.Author: Cynthia Ozick
Quote.QuoteValue: Literature is for the sake of humanity

Quote.Author: Cynthia Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: We are the yin and the yang of the creative process

Quote.Author: Cynthia Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of guys spend their lives saying no because it's an easier way to keep your job

Quote.Author: Cynthia Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: Sharing a triumph with someone you love is an incredible high

Quote.Author: Cynthia Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to write for Broadway

Quote.Author: Cynthia Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: Actually I was writing with people that didn't get records

Quote.Author: Cynthia Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: My nature is to be linear, and when I'm not, I feel really proud of myself

Quote.Author: Cynthia Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: But I'm someone who the more afraid I am, the more I want to do it to get the fear over with

Quote.Author: Cynthia Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't seem to write young enough anymore

Quote.Author: Cynthia Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: Even when I think I'm writing really young, they say it's too mature

Quote.Author: Cynthia Weil
Quote.QuoteValue: There is the great creative part of it. The writing is the best part

Quote.Author: D. A. Pennebaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I heard the new film, 'Tangerine,' was filmed entirely on iPhones. No cameras were involved!

Quote.Author: D. A. Pennebaker
Quote.QuoteValue: A film is made in somebody's head - out of their determination to do it at all

Quote.Author: D. A. Pennebaker
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody would let us do 'Crisis' again

Quote.Author: D. A. Pennebaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I think of all my movies as home movies! It's just that some are more expensive than others

Quote.Author: D. A. Pennebaker
Quote.QuoteValue: People don't really want reality. They want theater, and that's different

Quote.Author: D. A. Pennebaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't know Jack Kennedy that well, but Bobby was a hero to me

Quote.Author: D. A. Pennebaker
Quote.QuoteValue: To make theater out of real life, you need to catch dialogue when it happens

Quote.Author: D. A. Pennebaker
Quote.QuoteValue: Animals are companions on this planet, not necessarily our feedbags

Quote.Author: D. A. Pennebaker
Quote.QuoteValue: It was interesting to shoot history as it happens, without anyone demanding a huge story

Quote.Author: D. A. Pennebaker
Quote.QuoteValue: I had maybe heard 'The Times Are A-Changing' on the radio, but I had no idea who Dylan was. No idea

Quote.Author: D. H. Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: Men! The only animal in the world to fear

Quote.Author: D. H. Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to live my life so that my nights are not full of regrets

Quote.Author: D. H. Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is ours to be spent, not to be saved

Quote.Author: D. H. Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: The human soul needs actual beauty more than bread

Quote.Author: D. H. Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: In every living thing there is the desire for love

Quote.Author: D. H. Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: Be a good animal, true to your animal instincts

Quote.Author: D. H. Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: I shall always be a priest of love

Quote.Author: D. H. Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: If a woman hasn't got a tiny streak of harlot in her, she's a dry stick as a rule

Quote.Author: D. H. Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: It's bad taste to be wise all the time, like being at a perpetual funeral

Quote.Author: D. H. Lawrence
Quote.QuoteValue: My God, these folks don't know how to love - that's why they love so easily

Quote.Author: Dada Vaswani
Quote.QuoteValue: Sincere practice, makes the impossible possible

Quote.Author: Dada Vaswani
Quote.QuoteValue: True love bears all, endures all and triumphs!

Quote.Author: Dada Vaswani
Quote.QuoteValue: True success, true happiness lies in freedom and fulfillment

Quote.Author: Dada Vaswani
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to be happy, make others happy!

Quote.Author: Dada Vaswani
Quote.QuoteValue: Beware of the company you keep. See that you associate with the right type of people

Quote.Author: Dada Vaswani
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us not curse the darkness. Let us kindle little lights

Quote.Author: Dada Vaswani
Quote.QuoteValue: Call Him by whatever name you will, and He will respond

Quote.Author: Dada Vaswani
Quote.QuoteValue: What humanity needs today is not merely philosophy or theology, but a message or reassurance

Quote.Author: Dada Vaswani
Quote.QuoteValue: Marriage is a commitment for life. It is a permanent, lifelong relationship

Quote.Author: Dada Vaswani
Quote.QuoteValue: The children of today are the builders of a brave, new world - a world without want

Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship needs no words - it is solitude delivered from the anguish of loneliness

Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.QuoteValue: Never for the sake of peace and quiet deny your convictions

Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.QuoteValue: If only I may grow: firmer, simpler, quieter, warmer

Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.QuoteValue: We are not permitted to choose the frame of our destiny. But what we put into it is ours

Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.QuoteValue: Never, for the sake of peace and quiet, deny your own experience or convictions

Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.QuoteValue: It is playing safe that we create a world of utmost insecurity

Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.QuoteValue: Time goes by, reputation increases, ability declines

Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.QuoteValue: Constant attention by a good nurse may be just as important as a major operation by a surgeon

Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.QuoteValue: It is when we all play safe that we create a world of utmost insecurity

Quote.Author: Dag Hammarskjold
Quote.QuoteValue: Pray that your loneliness may spur you into finding something to live for, great enough to die for

Quote.Author: Daisaku Ikeda
Quote.QuoteValue: With love and patience, nothing is impossible

Quote.Author: Daisaku Ikeda
Quote.QuoteValue: No one is born hating others

Quote.Author: Daisaku Ikeda
Quote.QuoteValue: A person, who no matter how desperate the situation, gives others hope, is a true leader

Quote.Author: Daisaku Ikeda
Quote.QuoteValue: The determination to win is the better part of winning

Quote.Author: Daisaku Ikeda
Quote.QuoteValue: But I believe we must not allow feelings of defeat to take root in our hearts

Quote.Author: Daisaku Ikeda
Quote.QuoteValue: We must take steps to prevent further nuclear weapons development or modernization

Quote.Author: Daisaku Ikeda
Quote.QuoteValue: The gratification of desire is not happiness

Quote.Author: Daisaku Ikeda
Quote.QuoteValue: A genuinely happy person is one who has rendered others happy

Quote.Author: Daisaku Ikeda
Quote.QuoteValue: A healthy vision of the future is not possible without an accurate knowledge of the past

Quote.Author: Daisaku Ikeda
Quote.QuoteValue: When human beings live together, conflict is inevitable. War is not

Quote.Author: Dale Earnhardt
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a never ending battle of making your cars better and also trying to be better yourself

Quote.Author: Dale Earnhardt
Quote.QuoteValue: Two of my favorite things are my steering wheel and my Remington rifle

Quote.Author: Dale Earnhardt
Quote.QuoteValue: You win some, lose some, and wreck some

Quote.Author: Dale Earnhardt
Quote.QuoteValue: Richard Childress and myself have made some important innovations on our cars

Quote.Author: Dale Earnhardt
Quote.QuoteValue: Second place is just the first place loser

Quote.Author: Dale Earnhardt
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had confidence in myself all along. It was just a matter of getting the pieces back in place

Quote.Author: Dale Earnhardt
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to argue with my wife about her car - or my driving

Quote.Author: Dale Earnhardt
Quote.QuoteValue: That strategy of racing for the top five and racing for the win is where everybody wants to be

Quote.Author: Dale Earnhardt
Quote.QuoteValue: Finishing races is important, but racing is more important

Quote.Author: Dale Earnhardt
Quote.QuoteValue: I enjoy Saturday night racing

Quote.Author: Daley Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Sport fosters many things that are good; teamwork and leadership

Quote.Author: Daley Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm obsessive. I want to know the answer to how good I am. Most people aren't

Quote.Author: Daley Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm competitive - that's what defines me - and I love it

Quote.Author: Daley Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: But if kids take up things like hockey and football they will go back to it

Quote.Author: Daley Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not in it you can't win it

Quote.Author: Daley Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: We live in the best place on earth but at times the worst

Quote.Author: Daley Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: When I lost my decathlon world record I took it like a man. I only cried for ten hours

Quote.Author: Daley Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people doing the decathlon these days are quite boring, so people don't relate to them

Quote.Author: Daley Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: The stopwatch doesn't lie. The tape measure doesn't lie

Quote.Author: Daley Thompson
Quote.QuoteValue: I did not want to be the best black man of the year; I wanted to be the best man of the year

Quote.Author: Damian Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: Seeing a man praying to Allah is enough for some people to assume he is a terrorist

Quote.Author: Damian Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I love playing sport

Quote.Author: Damian Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm no more or less antisocial than the next person

Quote.Author: Damian Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: People need revelation, and then they need resolution

Quote.Author: Damian Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a slow starter

Quote.Author: Damian Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I think you can't be really posh and be an interesting actor. I'm a bit of a posh rough

Quote.Author: Damian Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not very good at strategizing

Quote.Author: Damian Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to go where the good writing is

Quote.Author: Damian Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: You just have to take control of your own performance

Quote.Author: Damian Lewis
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I think I am faintly spiritual

Quote.Author: Damien Chazelle
Quote.QuoteValue: As a drummer, you're always fighting for a level that you never quite attain

Quote.Author: Damien Chazelle
Quote.QuoteValue: People aren't inherently sympathetic

Quote.Author: Damien Chazelle
Quote.QuoteValue: There are a lot of musicians in my life. But movies came first for me. That was my original passion

Quote.Author: Damien Chazelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I like a set to be a happy place, where people can feel free to experiment

Quote.Author: Damien Chazelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I handle screenings and award ceremonies really badly

Quote.Author: Damien Chazelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a writer for hire. I wrote to pay the bills

Quote.Author: Damien Chazelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't feel the kind of joy every day playing drums that I thought you were supposed to feel

Quote.Author: Damien Chazelle
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm predisposed to never be in pure celebration mode

Quote.Author: Damien Chazelle
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is guaranteed to last, so you should just enjoy it as it happens

Quote.Author: Damien Chazelle
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad is a big jazz fan, and that was the reason I first got into jazz

Quote.Author: Dan Aykroyd
Quote.QuoteValue: You do not need a therapist if you own a motorcycle, any kind of motorcycle!

Quote.Author: Dan Aykroyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd make a bad preacher

Quote.Author: Dan Aykroyd
Quote.QuoteValue: Have I personally ever seen a ghost? Not one

Quote.Author: Dan Aykroyd
Quote.QuoteValue: You look at the floor and see the floor. I look at the floor and see molecules

Quote.Author: Dan Aykroyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a big fan of science fiction and of the worlds of the spiritual and the mystic

Quote.Author: Dan Aykroyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I have this kind of mild nice-guy exterior, but inside my heart is like a steel trap

Quote.Author: Dan Aykroyd
Quote.QuoteValue: My whole thing is to entertain, make people laugh and to forget about the real world for awhile

Quote.Author: Dan Aykroyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up on the edge of a national park in Canada - timberwolves, creeks, snow drifts

Quote.Author: Dan Aykroyd
Quote.QuoteValue: And, I believe that if a man dies with a single penny still sitting in the bank, he's a fool

Quote.Author: Dan Aykroyd
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a slight touch of Tourette's, which means you talk to yourself and bark and cry out at night

Quote.Author: Dan Gable
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you've wrestled, everything else in life is easy

Quote.Author: Dan Gable
Quote.QuoteValue: I shoot, I score. He shoots, I score

Quote.Author: Dan Gable
Quote.QuoteValue: My coaches were great. My mom and dad. My dad never missed a wrestling meet

Quote.Author: Dan Gable
Quote.QuoteValue: When my wrestlers got their hands raised, I jumped for joy

Quote.Author: Dan Gable
Quote.QuoteValue: My mind's never gone very far away from what I wanted to accomplish

Quote.Author: Dan Gable
Quote.QuoteValue: There's nothing like success

Quote.Author: Dan Gable
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been a fanatic about working out all my life

Quote.Author: Dan Gable
Quote.QuoteValue: We, as a wrestling community, better remember it is more than one individual that makes a winner

Quote.Author: Dan Gable
Quote.QuoteValue: My valleys are higher than most people's peaks. I stay at that level

Quote.Author: Dan Gable
Quote.QuoteValue: Right out of high school I never had the fear of getting beat, which is how most people lose

Quote.Author: Dan Gilbert
Quote.QuoteValue: I think Detroit is where muscle meets brains

Quote.Author: Dan Gilbert
Quote.QuoteValue: When we grew up, we wanted to do two things: to own a sports team and a casino

Quote.Author: Dan Gilbert
Quote.QuoteValue: LeBron James needs to go to another team with two superstars already so he can win a championship

Quote.Author: Dan Gilbert
Quote.QuoteValue: It's time for people to hold these athletes accountable for their actions

Quote.Author: Dan Gilbert
Quote.QuoteValue: Head coaching options are limited

Quote.Author: Dan Gilbert
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think we'd be the business that we are today if we were spread out in the suburban areas

Quote.Author: Dan Gilbert
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I've interviewed probably 1,500 people in my 24-year business career

Quote.Author: Dan Gilbert
Quote.QuoteValue: People want entertainment, a whole night of it, a whole experience

Quote.Author: Dan Gilbert
Quote.QuoteValue: As a franchise, we don't have any different expectations than anyone else

Quote.Author: Dan Gilbert
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in our players, our coaching staff, and our entire franchise

Quote.Author: Dan Harmon
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a fine line between a stream of consciousness and a babbling brook to nowhere

Quote.Author: Dan Harmon
Quote.QuoteValue: I love '30 Rock.' It's one of my favorite shows. It's certainly the gold standard of comedy writing

Quote.Author: Dan Harmon
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe I am just a jerk

Quote.Author: Dan Harmon
Quote.QuoteValue: Emotionally, shows like 'Cheers' and 'Taxi' were classic sitcoms when I was growing up

Quote.Author: Dan Harmon
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like my life has always been the 'Hey Look at Me Show.' I'm not apologetic about that

Quote.Author: Dan Harmon
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like I am a good person and a professional, very able leader of men

Quote.Author: Dan Harmon
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never done well when I've been appreciated. I've done best when I'm targeted for death

Quote.Author: Dan Harmon
Quote.QuoteValue: There are lots of emotions that go with the Fourth of July

Quote.Author: Dan Harmon
Quote.QuoteValue: I really like performing for people

Quote.Author: Dan Harmon
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that casting is probably the most important thing in television production

Quote.Author: Dan Rather
Quote.QuoteValue: A tough lesson in life that one has to learn is that not everybody wishes you well

Quote.Author: Dan Rather
Quote.QuoteValue: Courage is being afraid but going on anyhow

Quote.Author: Dan Rather
Quote.QuoteValue: This race is hotter than a Times Square Rolex

Quote.Author: Dan Rather
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't taunt the alligator until after you've crossed the creek

Quote.Author: Dan Rather
Quote.QuoteValue: Americans will put up with anything provided it doesn't block traffic

Quote.Author: Dan Rather
Quote.QuoteValue: Never eat spinach just before going on the air

Quote.Author: Dan Rather
Quote.QuoteValue: Only votes talk, everything else walks

Quote.Author: Dan Rather
Quote.QuoteValue: Are the Democrats going to dance the mandate Macarena?

Quote.Author: Dan Rather
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd much rather wear out than rust out

Quote.Author: Dan Rather
Quote.QuoteValue: If I didn't have a front-row seat on history, it was at least a seat on the aisle

Quote.Author: Dana Perino
Quote.QuoteValue: Sarcasm is like cheap wine - it leaves a terrible aftertaste

Quote.Author: Dana Perino
Quote.QuoteValue: Never refuse a breath mint - you don't know why it's being offered

Quote.Author: Dana Perino
Quote.QuoteValue: Civility is a choice

Quote.Author: Dana Perino
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that leaders should inspire you to be more like them

Quote.Author: Dana Perino
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved the writing process. I loved it

Quote.Author: Dana Perino
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone learns from their experiences

Quote.Author: Dana Perino
Quote.QuoteValue: I never thought I would write a memoir at age 40... but I did have this unique place in history

Quote.Author: Dana Perino
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a worrier by nature

Quote.Author: Dana Perino
Quote.QuoteValue: Commanders-in-chief make really tough decisions

Quote.Author: Dana Perino
Quote.QuoteValue: Conservatism by its very nature is compassionate

Quote.Author: Daniel Barenboim
Quote.QuoteValue: When playing music, it is possible to achieve a unique sense of peace

Quote.Author: Daniel Barenboim
Quote.QuoteValue: For many people, music is here to let them forget the daily chores of life

Quote.Author: Daniel Barenboim
Quote.QuoteValue: Tradition demands that we not speak poorly of the dead

Quote.Author: Daniel Barenboim
Quote.QuoteValue: To have real knowledge, one must understand the essence of things and not only their manifestations

Quote.Author: Daniel Barenboim
Quote.QuoteValue: In the beginning, there was silence. And out of the silence came the sound. The sound is not here

Quote.Author: Daniel Barenboim
Quote.QuoteValue: In my mother's belly, I remember not liking the tempi my father played the Beethoven Sonatas in

Quote.Author: Daniel Barenboim
Quote.QuoteValue: I have music in my brain all the time, all sorts

Quote.Author: Daniel Barenboim
Quote.QuoteValue: When you love somebody and they die young and you are young, too, it is very hard

Quote.Author: Daniel Barenboim
Quote.QuoteValue: The Barenboim Foundation has nothing to do with politics

Quote.Author: Daniel Barenboim
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like to be a terrorist for music education - to make a complete reform, all over the world

Quote.Author: Daniel Cormier
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be a champion in all facets of life

Quote.Author: Daniel Cormier
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be the best

Quote.Author: Daniel Cormier
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't get to the highest levels of the sport without having the basics in order

Quote.Author: Daniel Cormier
Quote.QuoteValue: Wrestling is a hard sport, but it's only a sport

Quote.Author: Daniel Cormier
Quote.QuoteValue: My little girl's in Heaven. She's my angel, and I can draw from that

Quote.Author: Daniel Cormier
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of times, losing a fight is tough. In your darkest hours, I guess your true colors show

Quote.Author: Daniel Cormier
Quote.QuoteValue: Gustafsson is a stud, man. He's a good fighter

Quote.Author: Daniel Cormier
Quote.QuoteValue: My confidence comes from me, not from Jon Jones. I can't draw my confidence from another person

Quote.Author: Daniel Cormier
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not on a slander campaign to ruin Jon Jones publicly. That's not what I set out to do

Quote.Author: Daniel Cormier
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'm as good if not better than everyone else

Quote.Author: Daniel Craig
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always retained my privacy, but now I protect it even more

Quote.Author: Daniel Craig
Quote.QuoteValue: I stopped worrying about being desired a long time ago

Quote.Author: Daniel Craig
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care what other people are doing

Quote.Author: Daniel Craig
Quote.QuoteValue: I just wanted to play a cowboy for a long time

Quote.Author: Daniel Craig
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always going to be someone with a bigger toy than yours

Quote.Author: Daniel Craig
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a Tim sandwich. The meat is fresh, but the bread is moldy

Quote.Author: Daniel Craig
Quote.QuoteValue: Any voices or fantasies, he lives with. Those are his everyday life things

Quote.Author: Daniel Craig
Quote.QuoteValue: Being on your own would be sad, sick and weird. I don't trust myself. I need that balance

Quote.Author: Daniel Craig
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never played a role in which someone's dark side shouldn't be explored

Quote.Author: Daniel Craig
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always loved to dress up a bit and show off

Quote.Author: Daniel Da
Quote.QuoteValue: ewis - My main memories of my father are of his illness

Quote.Author: Daniel Da
Quote.QuoteValue: ewis - If you have a certain wildness of spirit, a cabinet maker's workshop is not the place to express it

Quote.Author: Daniel Da
Quote.QuoteValue: ewis - I live in a landscape, which every single day of my life is enriching

Quote.Author: Daniel Da
Quote.QuoteValue: ewis - A voice is such a deep, personal reflection of character

Quote.Author: Daniel Da
Quote.QuoteValue: ewis - At some point in your life, if you're lucky, you get to design the way in which things evolve

Quote.Author: Daniel Da
Quote.QuoteValue: ewis - I'm a warrior when it comes to pursuing roles

Quote.Author: Daniel Da
Quote.QuoteValue: ewis - I hate wasting people's time

Quote.Author: Daniel Da
Quote.QuoteValue: ewis - Everybody has to know for themselves what they're capable of

Quote.Author: Daniel Da
Quote.QuoteValue: ewis - I'm a little bit perverse, and I just hate doing the thing that's the most obvious

Quote.Author: Daniel Da
Quote.QuoteValue: ewis - I love to sit and watch people. I love to sit and listen to people

Quote.Author: Daniel Goleman
Quote.QuoteValue: True compassion means not only feeling another's pain but also being moved to help relieve it

Quote.Author: Daniel Goleman
Quote.QuoteValue: A prerequisite to empathy is simply paying attention to the person in pain

Quote.Author: Daniel Goleman
Quote.QuoteValue: Societies can be sunk by the weight of buried ugliness

Quote.Author: Daniel Goleman
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, any effort to maximize your potential and ability is a good thing

Quote.Author: Daniel Goleman
Quote.QuoteValue: The emotional brain responds to an event more quickly than the thinking brain

Quote.Author: Daniel Goleman
Quote.QuoteValue: If you are doing mindfulness meditation, you are doing it with your ability to attend to the moment

Quote.Author: Daniel Goleman
Quote.QuoteValue: People tend to become more emotionally intelligent as they age and mature

Quote.Author: Daniel Goleman
Quote.QuoteValue: Teachers need to be comfortable talking about feelings

Quote.Author: Daniel Goleman
Quote.QuoteValue: Scheduling down time as part of your routine is hard but worth it, personally, even professionally

Quote.Author: Daniel Goleman
Quote.QuoteValue: Western business people often don't get the importance of establishing human relationships

Quote.Author: Daniel Humm
Quote.QuoteValue: I never finished high school. In fact, I hated going to school

Quote.Author: Daniel Humm
Quote.QuoteValue: I think sometimes with the parsnip, people are maybe a little afraid and don't use it as often

Quote.Author: Daniel Humm
Quote.QuoteValue: You've got to listen to your guests

Quote.Author: Daniel Humm
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm from Switzerland, so I grew up with great chocolate

Quote.Author: Daniel Humm
Quote.QuoteValue: Amuse-bouches are an opportunity to push boundaries

Quote.Author: Daniel Humm
Quote.QuoteValue: I love eggs. Eggs are probably one of the most versatile things we work with

Quote.Author: Daniel Humm
Quote.QuoteValue: I do believe there will always be a place for beautiful cookbooks that are real books

Quote.Author: Daniel Humm
Quote.QuoteValue: I would like to know more about how to cook Japanese food. I love it, but don't know much about it

Quote.Author: Daniel Humm
Quote.QuoteValue: Almonds can be used in sweet and savory dishes very easily

Quote.Author: Daniel Humm
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad was not happy about my not becoming an architect like him

Quote.Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance - it is the illusion of knowledge

Quote.Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Quote.QuoteValue: Freedom means the opportunity to be what we never thought we would be

Quote.Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Quote.QuoteValue: Some are born great, some achieve greatness, and some hire public relations officers

Quote.Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is learning what you didn't even know you didn't know

Quote.Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Quote.QuoteValue: I write to discover what I think. After all, the bars aren't open that early

Quote.Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Quote.QuoteValue: Reading is like the sex act - done privately, and often in bed

Quote.Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Quote.QuoteValue: A best-seller was a book which somehow sold well because it was selling well

Quote.Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Quote.QuoteValue: The celebrity is a person who is known for his well-knownness

Quote.Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Quote.QuoteValue: As you make your bed, so you must lie in it

Quote.Author: Daniel J. Boorstin
Quote.QuoteValue: The world of crime is a last refuge of the authentic, uncorrupted, spontaneous event

Quote.Author: Daniel Kahneman
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a wonderful thing to be optimistic. It keeps you healthy and it keeps you resilient

Quote.Author: Daniel Kahneman
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing in life is quite as important as you think it is while you're thinking about it
